description: This file defines API declarations and documentation for a PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) module, including functions for generating certificates, key pairs, and related cryptographic operations. It provides interfaces for creating PKI entities with various configurations, including with certificate attributes, crypto API handles, or pre-encoded certificates.

methods.name: GenerateAttrByCertificate
methods.description: Generates certificate attributes based on a provided ASN.1 certificate.

methods.name: AnscCreatePKIEntity
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity responsible for key generation and certificate requests, using a context and certificate attributes.

methods.name: AnscCreatePKIEntityWithCryptoAPI
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity with support for smartcard operation through CryptoAPI handles.

methods.name: AnscCreatePKIEntityWithCert
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity with an existing certificate and private key encoding, bypassing generation steps.

methods.name: AnscCreatePKIEntityWithKeyPair
methods.description: Creates a PKI entity with an existing key pair, but no certificate.

methods.name: PKIEntityRemove
methods.description: Frees memory associated with a PKI entity.
